page.title: 07LIKES AND DISLIKES
page.content: This survey of what people like and dislike in this block, is the result of visits to selected families. { {LIKES: "Because we've always lived {here"-}most of the families having come to the area in the Plantation of Ulster in the reign of King James 1. {Central location"-}easy access to adjacent A8 to Belfast, Larne, Ballyclare, Ballymena.{"Mild climate"- little snow, which soon melts. "Peaceful"- minor roads; low population; neighbours always helpful when needed, but keep to themselves.{ {"Good view"-}overlooking the coast and surrounding hills. {DISLIKES: "Being snowed in"-}a long, exposed driveway.{"Often windy"-}on the exposed plateau.{"We love living {here, but you probably wouldn't"-}the residents feel that others, towns- people especially, would feel lonely.
